name: 二次剩余
complexity: O(log p) for basic operations, O(log p) for Cipolla/Tonelli-Shanks with random steps
scenarios: Solving quadratic congruence x² ≡ a (mod p) for prime p
Determining if a number is a quadratic residue modulo p
Computing square roots modulo prime p
Used in cryptographic algorithms and primality testing
extensions: Legendre and Jacobi symbols for quadratic residue testing
Cipolla algorithm for square root modulo prime
Tonelli-Shanks algorithm for square root modulo prime
